class.name: KeyCollection
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Holds an array of key value pairs.
class.property: Holds the key value pair objects.

method.name: getCount
method.description: Returns a count of all key value pairs held in the items array.
method.return: The count of all key value pairs

method.name: add
method.description: Returns a count of all key value pairs held in the items array.

method.name: findKeyIndex
method.description: Searches the items array for the given key name and returns it's value.
method.param: The name of the key to search for
method.return: The index of the key if found otherwise -1;

method.name: hasKey
method.description: Determines if the key exists in the items array.
method.param: The name of the key to search for.
method.return: True if the key name exists otherwise false.

method.name: getValue
method.description: Access the value held at the given key name.
method.param: The name of the key to return the value of
method.return: The value held at the key.
